Package org.opensourcephysics.display.axes

Class XAxis

java.lang.Object
org.opensourcephysics.display.axes.XYAxis
org.opensourcephysics.display.axes.XAxis
All Implemented Interfaces:
Drawable, Interactive, Measurable
public class XAxis extends XYAxis
XAxis: an x axis that knows how to draw itself in a drawing panel. Copyright: Copyright (c) 2005 Gould, Christian, and Tobochnik
Version:
1.0
Author:
Wolfgang Christian
